title: Easter with Snowman Paul
description: Share the Easter Holiday Spirit with Snowman Paul Spring is in the air, and Snowman Paul sets his sights on winning the Big Easter Egg Painting Contest. He finds the perfect egg for the occasion, but Miss Hen is not ready to cooperate! Can Snowman Paul convince Miss Hen to entrust him with her precious egg? And are Paul’s painting skills good enough to win this highly competitive Easter Egg contest? Grandparents, parents, and young kids will delight in this rhyming and beautifully illustrated Easter-themed tale. Families will enjoy celebrating the holiday together with this adorable read-aloud. A fun gift to include in Easter basket stuffers or anytime. Order it now! The Snowman Paul series has 11 books so far that are perfect rhyming picture books for ages 2-5, and make a great bedtime story full of friendship, fun, and acceptance. Try them all!
